Created an attachment (id=9265)
Log File

The log file includes many exceptions.	After the initial error (including
several exceptions), the workbench layout was reset -- leaving me in the
Resource perspective.  After trying to switch back to the Java perspective,
neither the hierarchy nor the package explorer view could be created.  Lots of
exceptions abounded.
Note: EditorWorkbook is now called EditorStack.

This log file no longer applies.  The line referred to is 
"getPresentation().getControl()".  Tracking down where this code seems to have 
moved to, this appears to now be line 386 of PartStack.
do we know how to recreate this?

It appears to be a null presentation, which doesn't seem possible.  This bug 
hasn't been seen in a while -- closing as WORKSFORME.
